titles.title: Port Security Boots on the Ground Act
Port Security Boots on the Ground Act
To amend title 46, United States Code, regarding port security grant funding for mandated security personnel, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Border and Maritime Security.

bill.summary: Port Security Boots on the Ground Act - Authorizes the use of port security grant program funds for overtime and backfill costs for mandated Coast Guard security personnel, except that not more than 50% of funds received by a grantee for a fiscal year may be used for such costs.
